tools.name: live-agent-handoff
tools.description: Transfers the call to a human agent

tools.name: send-dtmf
tools.description: This sends DTMF tones to the call

dtmfDigit.description: The DTMF digit value to send

tools.name: send-sms
tools.description: This sends an SMS message to the number provided

to.description: The number to send the SMS to. This HAS to be in +1234567890 format

tools.name: start-capture
tools.description: This starts the capturing on a call for the current call SID. It returns a payment SID

callSid.description: This is the call SID for the current call.

tools.name: capture-card
tools.description: This starts capturing card data on a call for the current call SID and payment SID. It returns masked card data in PaymentCardNumber

callSid.description: This is the call SID for the current call.

paymentSid.description: This is the payment SID for the current call SID.

tools.name: capture-security-code
tools.description: This starts capturing security code data on a call for the current call SID and payment SID. It returns masked security code data in SecurityCode

callSid.description: This is the call SID for the current call.

paymentSid.description: This is the payment SID for the current call SID.

tools.name: capture-expiry-date
tools.description: This starts capturing card expiration date on a call for the current call SID and payment SID. It returns the expiration date data in ExpirationDate

callSid.description: This is the call SID for the current call.

paymentSid.description: This is the payment SID for the current call SID.

tools.name: finish-capture
tools.description: This finishes capturing card data on a call for the current call SID and payment SID. It returns a payment token in PaymentToken

callSid.description: This is the call SID for the current call.

paymentSid.description: This is the payment SID for the current call SID.

tools.name: cancel-capture
tools.description: Cancels the payment capture session for the current call SID and payment SID

callSid.description: This is the call SID for the current call.

paymentSid.description: This is the payment SID for the current call SID.

tools.name: set-silence-detection
tools.description: Enables or disables silence detection monitoring during the call. When enabled, the system monitors for periods of silence and sends reminder messages. When disabled, no silence monitoring occurs. Use this to temporarily disable silence detection during activities where the caller may not speak for extended periods (e.g., entering payment information, looking up documents).

enabled.description: Set to true to enable silence detection, false to disable it
